title: Insights Coordinator Junior
content:
Teads are looking for an Insights Coordinator to join our CEE team and work across research projects across international markets, providing insight for Advertisers and media agencies. This is the perfect opportunity for someone who wants to start a successful journey within insights. 
The role will be based in Warsaw and involve providing support to the team, in particular helping to produce research reports which are a critically important output for our Clients.
By the end of the contact, you will have gained valuable experience in the field of digital advertising, data-driven insights, research and career development opportunities. 
Responsibilities

Organising the setup and production of Teads' in house brand lift solution (Brand Pulse)
Creating case studies for our existing research projects (not limited to Brand Pulse) to showcase creative effectiveness, brand uplift, and measurement studies
Utilising in-house and third-party audience insight tools using a variety of sources (1st, 2nd and 3rd  party data, surveys, panel measurement, eye tracking etc)
Supporting the development of consumer and market insights for verticals
Leveraging traffic insights from Teads media barometer
Answering ad hoc requests from management and assisting the Intelligence team with their daily workflow  

Requirements

Previous experience as research/analytical assistant will be an advantage
Educated to degree level or equivalent (preferably in Marketing, Market Research, Media, Advertising/Communications)
Outstanding communication skills - written and verbal
Bright and intelligent, with strong numerical, analytical & data skills
Exceptional attention to detail
Critical thinking and ability to maintain high quality
Highly organised and able to manage multiple competing priorities
Able to work under pressure, in a fast-paced environment
Very good problem solving
Excellent Excel and PowerPoint skills with G-Suite experience (e.g. Google Slides, Sheets etc) preferred
Demonstrable interest in research methodologies and analytical tools, consumer behaviour, digital media and the advertising industry
Your mother tongue is Polish and you're fluent in English

===== ABOUT TEADS ======
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, end-to-end technology platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media. As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimisation technologies.For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers. Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach 1.9 billion unique monthly users* in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1000+ people in 30 countries.
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
*Global reach as of October 2021
